mechanics.outcome: Create a nonliving object of vegetable matter (soft goods, rope, wood) or mineral (stone, crystal, metal)

mechanics.trigger: Creating an object with Creation spell
mechanics.outcome: Object must be no larger than a 5-foot cube

mechanics.trigger: Creating an object with Creation spell
mechanics.outcome: Object's form and material must have been seen by caster before

mechanics.condition: Object material is stone or crystal
Object material is adamantine or mithral

mechanics.trigger: Determining duration of object created by Creation spell
mechanics.condition: Object is composed of multiple materials
mechanics.outcome: Duration is determined by the material with the shortest listed duration

mechanics.condition: A material component for that spell is an object created by the Creation spell

description_text: You pull wisps of shadow material from the Shadowfell to create a nonliving object of vegetable matter within range: soft goods, rope, wood, or something similar. You can also use this spell to create mineral objects such as stone, crystal, or metal. The object created must be no larger than a 5-foot cube, and the object must be of a form and material that you have seen before.The duration depends on the object's material. If the object is composed of multiple materials, use the shortest duration.| Material | Duration ||---|---|| Vegetable matter | 1 day || Stone or crystal | 12 hours || Precious metals | 1 hour || Gems | 10 minutes || Adamantine or mithral | 1 minute |Using any material created by this spell as another spell's material component causes that spell to fail.
